languages.text: "Воистину, перед нами наследни{mf|к|ца} Леди Теодоры, что и из камня могла выжать золото. Сестра Джуд ни за что не откажется от своего заявления и будет вынуждена согласиться на ваши условия."
"Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, перед нами наследни{mf|к|ца} Леди Теодоры, что и из камня могла выжать золото. Сестра Джуд ни за что не откажется от своего заявления и будет вынуждена согласиться на ваши условия."

traits.locale_text: "Spoken like a true {mf|heir|heiress} to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions. And so, the verdict!"

"Spoken like a true {mf|heir|heiress} to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions. And so, the verdict!"

"Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions. And so, the verdict!"

"Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions. And so, the verdict!"
"Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."
"Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

languages.text: "So spricht {mf|ein wahrer Erbe|eine wahre Erbin} von Lady Theodora, die Gold aus einem Stein pressen konnte. Schwester Juth würde ihre Aussage niemals widerrufen. Ihr bleibt nichts anderes übrig, als Eure Bedingungen zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: "So spricht {mf|ein wahrer Erbe|eine wahre Erbin} von Lady Theodora, die Gold aus einem Stein pressen konnte. Schwester Juth würde ihre Aussage niemals widerrufen. Ihr bleibt nichts anderes übrig, als Eure Bedingungen zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: « Voilà qui est parler en digne {mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora, elle qui aurait su extorquer de l'or à une statue de marbre. Sœur Juth ne se rétractera jamais. Elle n'aura d'autre choix que d'accepter vos conditions. »
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui est parler en digne {mf|héritier|héritière} de dame Théodora, elle qui aurait su extorquer de l'or à une statue de marbre. Sœur Juth ne se rétractera jamais. Elle n'aura d'autre choix que d'accepter vos conditions. »

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人能从石头里榨出金子，而您的判决表明，您确实是她真正的继承人。犹斯修女是不会收回她的主张的，因此她别无选择，只能接受您的条件。”
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人能从石头里榨出金子，而您的判决表明，您确实是她真正的继承人。犹斯修女是不会收回她的主张的，因此她别无选择，只能接受您的条件。”

languages.text: «Ha hablado como {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de lady Theodora, que era capaz de sacar dinero a una piedra. La hermana Juth nunca retractará su declaración. No tendrá más remedio que aceptar sus condiciones».
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: «Ha hablado como {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a} de lady Theodora, que era capaz de sacar dinero a una piedra. La hermana Juth nunca retractará su declaración. No tendrá más remedio que aceptar sus condiciones».

languages.text: 「まさに、岩からでも金を絞り出すと言われたレディ・シオドーラの正統な後継者らしいお言葉です。シスター・ジュスは自分の証言を撤回することは決してありません。彼女には、あなたの条件を受け入れる以外に選択肢はないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: 「まさに、岩からでも金を絞り出すと言われたレディ・シオドーラの正統な後継者らしいお言葉です。シスター・ジュスは自分の証言を撤回することは決してありません。彼女には、あなたの条件を受け入れる以外に選択肢はないでしょう」

languages.text: "Taşı sıksanız suyunu çıkarırsınız, Leydi Theodora'nın vârisinden de bu beklenirdi. Rahibe Juth, ifadesini asla geri çekmez. Bu koşulları kabul etmeye mecbur şimdi."
languages.original_text: "Spoken like a true heir to Lady Theodora, who could squeeze gold out of a rock. Sister Juth would never recant her statement. She will have no choice but to accept your conditions."

traits.locale_text: "Taşı sıksanız suyunu çıkarırsınız, Leydi Theodora'nın varisinden de bu beklenirdi. Rahibe Juth, ifadesini asla geri çekmez. Bu koşulları kabul etmeye mecbur şimdi."
